00033 /* Usage pattern for CameraList for users external of
00034  * libgphoto2, such as libgphoto2 frontends:
00035  *
00036  *    CameraList *list;
00037  *    gp_list_new (&list);
00038  *    init_list_somehow (list);
00039  *    for (i=0; i < gp_list_count(list); i++) {
00040  *        char *name, *value;
00041  *        gp_list_get_name (list, i, &name);
00042  *        gp_list_get_name (list, i, &value);
00043  *        do_something_with (name, value);
00044  *    }
00045  *    gp_list_free (list);
00046  *
00047  * Please do NOT directly instantiate a CameraList object like this:
00048  *               CameraList foo;     // DO NOT DO THIS
00049  * Please do NOT directly access the structure members like this:
00050  *               list->entry[i].name // DO NOT DO THIS
00051  */
00052 typedef struct _CameraList CameraList;
